name: Mello's Pet Rescue
description:
I had so much fun doing the pet hunt in the strudel group on deviantart that I got a little too hype and got it into my head to make a quick little game of it, since I hadn't messed with ren'py in a while. The game is fairly quick, you simply explore different areas until you find all the pets! I tried some new things with the game, and while it ran well for me let me know if you run into any problems.

Mello is one of my characters. She's a species called strudels which were created by loppyrae
